en.title: Hugo Martini√®re - Web Site
en.hero-description: Data Analyst, Data Scientist, Data Engineer
en.description: I am a data scientist passionate about data analysis.
en.about-description: Hello, my name is Hugo, a Data Science student. Passionate about data exploration, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, I invite you to explore my website where I share my projects, skills, and interests. Enjoy your visit!
en.experience-1-description: Data extraction, analysis, study automation, and statistical modeling to support decision-making
en.experience-2-university: Universit√© Bretagne Sud, UFR SSI, Vannes
en.experience-2-description: Enhancing my skills in Data Science and Data Analysis
en.experience-3-university: Universit√© Bretagne Sud, UFR SSI, Vannes
en.experience-3-description: Analysis and comparison of physical success criteria between Ligue 1 and Ligue 2 for Stade Lavallois FC
en.experience-4-role: Master's Degree 1 in Data Science and Statistical Modeling
en.experience-4-university: Universit√© Bretagne Sud, UFR SSI, Vannes
en.experience-4-description: Specialization in statistical modeling with a focus on advanced methods for data analysis and interpretation
en.experience-5-role:
Bachelor's Degree in Mathematics, 
Computer Science, Statistics
en.experience-5-university: Universit√© Bretagne Sud, UFR SSI, Vannes
en.experience-5-description: Deepening my skills in statistical theory and strengthening my knowledge in computer science, especially for database management and optimization
en.experience-6-description: Creation of various vulnerability indices for the Rennes agglomeration, development of dashboards
en.experience-7-description: Introduction to the field of data, learning database management, and data visualization
en.project-1-title: Ligue 1 vs Ligue 2: What Are the Athletic Differences?
en.project-1-description: In this study, conducted in collaboration with Stade Lavallois FC, my goal was to analyze the athletic differences between the top two divisions of French football, Ligue 1 and Ligue 2. Additionally, I aimed to establish a link between the athletic performance of the teams and their final season ranking.
en.project-2-description: Modeling the price gap between the Intraday market and the SPOT market (the electricity market where transactions are made for next-day delivery) to forecast its rise or fall in the coming days.
en.project-3-description: In the context of growing ambulatory care, I compared the complication risks within 30 days of ambulatory hospitalization versus traditional hospitalization to determine if ambulatory care presented an increased risk.
en.project-4-description: Modeling the rates for two insurance covers: damage coverage, which protects against material loss due to accidents, and glass breakage coverage, which covers damage to glass surfaces, to better understand the criteria influencing the setting of these rates.
en.project-5-description: In analyzing the factors influencing penalty success, I compared the performances of penalty takers during the 2019-2020 season of the five major European leagues, considering various factors such as the taker's identity, penalty importance, the game period, etc., to identify the elements impacting the success rate.
en.testimonial-1-text: Rigorous, conscientious, and committed, Mr. Martini√®re has provided significant support to our ongoing work and has been able to enhance and apply his skills in software and programming languages such as Access and SQL during this period. Furthermore, he has integrated very well into the APRAS team and has been unanimously appreciated.
en.testimonial-2-text: I had the responsibility of supervising Hugo Martini√®re during his internship at the IUT of Vannes. This experience was very positive. He demonstrated an excellent level of seriousness and autonomy, always completing his tasks with precision. Hugo adapted very well to his work environment and approached his missions professionally. His curiosity and involvement were noticeable, allowing him to make progress in his learning. He also showed very valuable interpersonal qualities. I am convinced that all his qualities will make a positive contribution to his future employer.

en.interet-sport-text: Football and badminton, which I have practiced in a club, are at the heart of my passion for sports.
en.interet-innovation-text: Technological advancements, especially in artificial intelligence, spark my curiosity.
